alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 9:55PM EDT until July 01 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 955 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of West Bainbridge, or 9 miles north of Bainbridge, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Donalsonville, West Bainbridge, Attapulgus, Iron City, Climax, Brinson, Vada, Hanover, Ausmac, Reynoldsville, Lela, Eldorendo, Decatur Co A/P, Steinham Store, Fowlstown, Cyrene and Sharphagen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
